attributes.action: Further Consultation on Core Strategy for NWLDC in a simpler form
attributes.additional_details: North West Leicestershire Core Strategy Consultation ended on 9th July at 5pm.  MOST people found themselves excluded from the process by the complicated procedure they had to follow, as such MOST peoples views were not heard.  This petition is to insist on a further consultation period in a simpler form to make it TOTALLY inclusive.
